case 79: itemDef.modelid = 3288; itemDef.name = "Death Cape"; itemDef.modelZoom = 1385; itemDef.modelRotationY = 500; itemDef.modelRotationX = 2000; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.stackable = false; itemDef.value = 1; itemDef.membersObject = true; itemDef.anInt165 = 3287; itemDef.anInt200 = 3287; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Skull"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; itemDef.anInt175 = 14; itemDef.anInt197 = 7; break;
